titles.title: For the relief of Marleen R. Delay.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/11/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified amount to Marlene R. Delay, of San Mateo, California, in full satisfaction of the renewed judgment in favor of William H. Delay against the Pacific Northwest River Basins Commission for wrongful termination of employment.
